a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Human Development Index vs. Historical Index of Human Development,
The HDI is an index capturing life expectancy, expected and average years of schooling and gross national income (GNI) per
capita and commonly used by the UN as an index measure of development.
The HIHD is based on life expectancy, adult literacy, educational enrollment rates and GDP per capita.
Source: UNDP; Prados de la Escosura (2018)
